descriptionHTML:
Capone weather wear watch face

Capone is a modern hybrid watch face with a futuristic on and off animation pattern and displays current weather conditions along with the time, date and wearable / phone battery indicator.

This watch face design turns your Android watch into a high-end weather timepiece.

Capone analog watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic watches and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design.
Capone is designed for ultimate readability in low light situations.
It works on all Android Wear devices and supports round and square smartwatches.


Capone analog watchface adds a sophisticated look to your android wear.

!!! TO USE ALL THE FOLOWING FUNCTION please be shure that your "android wear" app is connected with your watch !!!

✔ Weather data for current location ( GPS or IP location )
✔ Display temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius
✔ Watch battery indicator
✔ Phone battery indicator
✔ Watch date of month widget
✔ Superior readability
✔ Exclusive design
✔ Battery saving ambient mode minimal glow design
✔ Watch widgets optional on / off
✔ Supports round and squared watches

Customization of Capone watch face

- Open Android Wear app
- Select Capone watch face in the selection
- One Click on the icon activates the watch face on your smart watch device
- Then Double click on icon brings you to customization page
- Now you can customize Capone watch face ( date widget on/off , battery watch widget on/off, Weather on/off )

Supported devices

- This watchface works on all Android Wear devices
- Supports round (LG G Watch R and Moto 360) and rectangular smartwatches ( Samsung Gear Live , LG G Watch, ASUS ZenWatch and Sony SmartWatch 3 ).
- Does NOT work on Samsung Gear and smartwatches using other operating systems

!! Please contact me if you have any trouble installing the app !!

Tapaniwearable Germany Smart Watch & Android wearable design Company ©
